stores.name: Sushi Koromo
stores.description: Known for its relaxed jazz ambiance and morning nigiri sets offering excellent value.
stores.details: Sushi Koromo offers a unique dining experience with its fusion of traditional sushi and a modern atmosphere. The chef selects the freshest ingredients daily from the market.

stores.name: Tsukiji Wine Stand 88
stores.description: A cozy spot to enjoy a selection of wines paired with fresh seafood from the market.
stores.details: This wine stand boasts an extensive collection of both local and international wines. The staff is knowledgeable and can recommend pairings with their seafood tapas.

stores.name: Strawberry Mochi at Tsukiji Soratsuki
stores.description: Indulge in traditional ichigo daifuku with red bean paste and fresh strawberry wrapped in mochi.
stores.details: A must-try delicacy, the strawberry mochi here is made fresh daily. The balance of sweetness and texture makes it a favorite among locals and tourists alike.
